entry.title: Louis-CharlesBiron/canvasDotEffect: CanvasDotEffect is a lightweight JS library that helps create customizable and interactive dot-based effects using the Canvas API
entry.content: CanvasDotEffect is a lightweight JS library that helps create customizable and interactive dot-based effects using the Canvas API

entry.title: Rahul1342002/file_transfer_app: A simple file transfer app for sharing files over a local network. Built with React (frontend) and Express.js with Socket.io (backend), it enables real-time file sharing without the internet. Features drag-and-drop upload, secure handling with Multer, and a web-based UI for easy access. Fast, lightweight, and ideal for local networks.
entry.content: A simple file transfer app for sharing files over a local network. Built with React (frontend) and Express.js with Socket.io (backend), it enables real-time file sharing without the internet. Features drag-and-drop upload, secure handling with Multer, and a web-based UI for easy access. Fast, lightweight, and ideal for local networks.

entry.content: TouchNC is a lightweight UI for FluidNC.

entry.title: thegreedymaster1234/JavaScript-Email-Protection-JEP: JavaScript Email Protection (JEP) is a simple and lightweight way to keep your email safe from spam bots. Instead of leaving your email exposed in plain HTML (where bots can easily grab it), this script dynamically inserts it using JavaScript—making it way harder for scrapers to detect.
entry.content: JavaScript Email Protection (JEP) is a simple and lightweight way to keep your email safe from spam bots. Instead of leaving your email exposed in plain HTML (where bots can easily grab it), this script dynamically inserts it using JavaScript—making it way harder for scrapers to detect.
